products.name: Blended Sienna
products.description: Vinyl flooring is a versatile and popular flooring option known for its durability, affordability, and aesthetic appeal. Composed primarily of PVC (polyvinyl chloride) and other synthetic materials, vinyl flooring comes in various styles, mimicking the look of natural materials like wood, stone, and tile. Here's a brief description highlighting key aspects of vinyl flooring
